experience.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer Intern
details: Created and maintained database queries and API endpoints using PostgreSQL and Java.
Developed and maintained frontend pages using Scala, React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Designed unit and integration tests to ensure smooth deployment.
Optimized API calls, reducing loading times of large tables by ~80%.
Automated manual tasks for non-technical users by developing new web pages.
Effectively managed multiple tickets to minimize downtime.
Collaborated with team members to discuss ideas, clarify issues, and communicate updates.
Utilized GitHub, Jenkins, and Jira for code management, deployment, and documentation.

projects.name: Jukeboxd
projects.description: A social music platform built with React, Express, and MariaDB, allowing users to track, rate, and review music. Includes paginated search, encrypted authentication, and a modern UI with CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: AI Stock Predicter
projects.description: An AI model using Keras in Python to predict stock prices over a 30-day period based on S&P 500 data from the yfinance API, utilizing LSTM for predictions.

projects.name: Stock Scanner
projects.description: A tool that ranks tickers based on volatility, volume, and float, displaying sorted results in a Tkinter GUI.

projects.name: Gap Scanner
projects.description: An application that identifies price gaps in stock tickers, displaying largest gaps in premarket, using Yahoo Finance API with a Tkinter GUI.

projects.name: till-failure
projects.description: A React Native gym workout app that recommends weights based on progress. Features a database of 500 exercises, filtering by target muscles, and modern UI design.

projects.name: Translit Copt
projects.description: A software using Tesseract OCR and Python to detect foreign text from images and transliterate to English with a custom library.
